title: Leaver buster
body:
Hello,
I'm starting a new discussion regarding  leaver buster. Now I don't usually afk a lot but when I do its for a valid reason, but I'm not saying that I shouldn't get punished for it because I my self hate it when a team member afks, all I'm asking for is maybe to reduce the time on the buster or at least reduce the number of low priority que, I honestly had enough of waiting 1 hour 40 minutes (added all together) doing nothing. Thank you .
